verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H7378>plead<s%> your <S%H7378>case<s%> <S%H854>before<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> And let the <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

<S%H8085>"Listen,<s%> you <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> to the <S%H7379>indictment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And you <S%H386>enduring<s%> <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has a <S%H7379>case<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> His <S%H5971>people;<s%> Even with <S%H3478>Israel<s%> He will <S%H3198>dispute.<s%>
"My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> to you, And <S%H4100>how<s%> have I <S%H3811>wearied<s%> you? <S%H6030>Answer<s%> Me.

<S%H3588>"Indeed,<s%> I <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> And <S%H6299>ransomed<s%> you from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slavery,<s%> And I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam.<s%>

"My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3289>counseled<s%> And <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him, [And] from <S%H7851>Shittim<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> In <S%H4616>order<s%> that you might <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H6666>acts<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

With <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H6923>come<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> And <S%H3721>bow<s%> myself before the <S%H430>God<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>? Shall I <S%H6923>come<s%> to Him with <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> With <S%H8141>yearling<s%> <S%H5695>calves<s%>?

Does the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7521>take<s%> <S%H7521>delight<s%> in <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H352>rams,<s%> In <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousand<s%> <S%H5158>rivers<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>? Shall I <S%H5414>present<s%> my first-born [for] my <S%H6588>rebellious<s%> <S%H6588>acts,<s%> The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of my <S%H990>body<s%> for the <S%H9128>sin<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%>?

He has <S%H5046>told<s%> you, O <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> And <S%H4100>what<s%> does the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1875>require<s%> of you But to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> And to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6800>humbly<s%> with your <S%H430>God<s%>?

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7121>call<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> â€“ And it is <S%H8454>sound<s%> <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name:<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> O <S%H4294>tribe.<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H3259>appointed<s%> its time?

"Is there <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> [Along with] <S%H214>treasures<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> And a <S%H7332>short<s%> <S%H374>measure<s%> [that is] <S%H2194>cursed<s%>?

"For the <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H6223>men<s%> of [the] city are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2555>violence,<s%> Her <S%H3427>residents<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies,<s%> And their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

"You will <S%H398>eat,<s%> but you will not be <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> And your <S%H3445>vileness<s%> will be in your <S%H7130>midst.<s%> You will [try to] <S%H5472>remove<s%> [for safekeeping], But you will not <S%H6403>preserve<s%> [anything], And <S%H834>what<s%> you do <S%H6403>preserve<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

"You will <S%H2232>sow<s%> but you will not <S%H7114>reap.<s%> You will <S%H1869>tread<s%> the <S%H2132>olive<s%> but will not <S%H5480>anoint<s%> yourself with <S%H8081>oil;<s%> And the <S%H8492>grapes,<s%> but you will not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

"The <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> are <S%H8104>observed;<s%> And in their <S%H4156>devices<s%> you <S%H1980>walk.<s%> <S%H4616>Therefore,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you up for <S%H8047>destruction<s%> And your <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> for <S%H8322>derision,<s%> And you will <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of My <S%H5971>people.<s%>"
